channel.title: Dragon claws need help
channel.description:
I need help with dragon claws the dragon claws work on npc but not plays on players it only hits twice on spec. Then to see the spec bar i have to put a melle wep with spec on then put d claws and the spec shows. Then after i spec it still shows that the spec is ready to spec but it doesnt and it doesnt show the spec drained it stays 100% but it says im out of spec.
list of whats wrong
claws spec on npc but not players gfx and animation weird(my person looks like a blob that flings every where) no spec bar unless you wear a melle wep with spec spec doesnt show that it drains after spec spec bar stays highlighted
if you need to get on teamviewer then leave a comment below and ill pm u the pass and id

item.title: Dragon claws need help
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

I need help with dragon claws the dragon claws work on npc but not plays on players it only hits twice on spec. Then to see the spec bar i have to put a melle wep with spec on then put d claws and the spec shows. Then after i spec it still shows that the spec is ready to spec but it doesnt and it doesnt show the spec drained it stays 100% but it says im out of spec.

list of whats wrong

claws spec on npc but not players
gfx and animation weird(my person looks like a blob that flings every where)
no spec bar unless you wear a melle wep with spec
spec doesnt show that it drains after spec
spec bar stays highlighted

if you need to get on teamviewer then leave a comment below and ill pm u the pass and id
